ygData.subject: Balistica up and running
ygData.msgSnippet: She finally came back to her senses. She was in a dark room with grey walls. She obviously did not recognize the place. In fact she hardly remembered

Subject: Balistica up and running
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=225937926; y=91lgBDuXQFWYUFORv3aJUbLt4pqKX9LWv-fhWoFRSa56_xulJYfK

She finally came back to her senses. She was in a dark room with grey
walls. She obviously did not recognize the place. In fact she hardly
remembered anything... except a burning mix of emotions towards
someone... Azure. Where was he now?

As she stood up in a prone position, a door slid open and a tall
robot, with huge weapons in his back, entered without saying a word.

Balistica: You're the one who had me repaired? Well, I guess I-

???: You have three choices, Maximal. (He turned to face her) You see,
we are quite a xenophobic bunch here. We don't like Maximals. However,
we are disposed to let you join us as you are one of the Ancients.
Should you not wish to do this, you will have to join the Governmental
Army. There is no other option.

She was flabbergasted. She hadn't even said a word and she was being
stigmatized! Just what was going on?

Balistica: Huh... Just... Just who do you represent?

???: I am from the Iron Skulls. We believe that the Maximals are going
to lead us astray. War is brewing, and survival means we must impose
our leadership.

Balistica: On second thought... I think I'll get into the army...

???: As you wish... Someone will fetch you soon enough.
